policy.Description: Provides full access to AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Creates an ACM Private CA and its associated private key and configuration.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Creates an audit report for an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Creates a permission for an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Deletes an ACM Private CA and its associated private key and configuration.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Deletes a permission for an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Deletes the policy for an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Returns a list of the configuration and status fields contained in the specified ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Returns the status and information about an ACM Private CA audit report.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Retrieves an ACM Private CA certificate and certificate chain for the certificate authority specified by an ARN.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Retrieves an ACM Private CA certificate and certificate chain for the certificate authority specified by an ARN.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Retrieves an ACM Private CA certificate signing request (CSR) for the certificate-authority specified by an ARN.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Retrieves the policy on an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Imports an SSL/TLS certificate into ACM Private CA for use as the CA certificate of an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Issues an ACM Private CA certificate.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Retrieves a list of the ACM Private CA certificate authority ARNs, and a summary of the status of each CA in the calling account.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Lists the permissions that have been applied to the ACM Private CA certificate authority.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Lists the tags that have been applied to the ACM Private CA certificate authority.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Puts a policy on an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Restores an ACM Private CA from the deleted state to the state it was in when deleted.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Revokes a certificate issued by an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Adds one or more tags to an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Remove one or more tags from an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority

actions.Description: Updates the configuration of an ACM Private CA.
actions.ServiceName: AWS Certificate Manager Private Certificate Authority
